summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Mission Control dashboard Phase 1A structure. All core UI components, theming, and mock data display working correctly.
passed_tests: Top bar renders with diamond icon and 'MISSION CONTROL' title
Stat counters display correct values (11 AGENTS ACTIVE, 35 TASKS IN QUEUE)
Live clock displays time in HH:MM:SS format and updates correctly
ONLINE status pill with green pulsing dot renders correctly
Theme toggle switches between dark/light mode successfully
All 10 agents listed with correct names, roles, and badges
Role badge colors: LEAD=orange, INT=blue, SPC=grey working correctly
Status dots: green pulsing for 8 WORKING agents, grey static for 2 IDLE agents (Wanda, Wong)
Agents panel shows correct count badge (10)
Mission Queue has 5 kanban columns with correct names and count 0
Live Feed panel has 6 filter tabs (All, Tasks, Comments, Decisions, Docs, Status)
Live Feed tabs are clickable and show active state
3-panel layout with correct widths (240px left, 320px right)
CSS variables for theming working correctly
